                         Adobe Encore CS4.0.1.048 Portable 



Adobe Encore CS4 software is a rich set of creative tools for DVD and Blu-ray Disc 
authoring as well as SWF file export to the web. 


Top features:
 
* Timesaving Dynamic Link integration with Adobe Premiere Pro CS4. 
* Publishing of DVD projects to the web. 
* Industry-leading Blu-ray Disc authoring. 
* Flowchart. 
* Subtitle track export for editing. 
* FireWire video out. 
* Adobe Photoshop integration. 
* Delivery to three formats from a single project file. 
* Slide show editor. 
* Adobe After Effects CS4 integration. 
* Resource Central Publishing of DVD projects to the web enhanced With one click, 
  easily create SWF versions of your DVD and Blu-ray Disc projects for the web 
  using Encore CS4. 
* Produce content compatible with the Adobe Flash Player runtime, complete with 
  DVD interactivity and menus, without opening another application. 
* Watch the tutorial on Adobe TV Slide show editor Build and arrange slide shows 
  with ease. 
* Define shows as browsable or autoplay with optional narration or music. 
* Set slide durations, add transitions, and apply pan-and-zoom effects. 
* FireWire video out new Preview your project on the screen of your choice before 
  burning. 
* Formatting and cropping look different on a computer monitor versus a TV screen. 
* Professional DVD mastering tools Create DVD masters using DLT tape and 
  incorporate DVD-standard copy protection, region coding, and playback controls. 
* Dual-layer discs new Make room for more content or higher quality video encoding
* with 8.54GB dual-layer DVDs and 50GB dual-layer Blu-ray discs. 
* Wide degree of playback compatibility Produce consistent, high-quality results 
  and output to all recordable DVD formats for a wide degree of playback 
  compatibility. 
* DTS audio support Increase your audio format options with support for DTS audio. 
* Copy protection Use DVD-standard copy protection methods to protect your content 
  against unauthorized use. 
* User operations control Disable or enable the viewer's remote control operations 
  in specific sections of a DVD for example, to help ensure the display of 
  mandatory content such as copyright notices. 
* Closed-caption support Import line 21 files to add closed captions to your DVDs 
  (applies to NTSC titles only).
* And many more!
